title: Killing of Renee Good in Minneapolis reignites US debate over ICE
subhead: The 37-year-old mother was shot dead by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement agent while maneuvering her vehicle on a street on Wednesday. Footage of the incident, which does not confirm the self-defense claim put forward by the Trump administration, has sparked outrage across the United States.

title: Russia says it used hypersonic missile against Ukraine
Northern Sudan watches the war from afar
Israeli government accelerates settlement expansion in occupied West Bank
subhead: With tenders for 9,600 housing units for Jewish families in the occupied West Bank, 2025 set a record, with an openly stated goal of delivering 'a fatal blow to the idea of a Palestinian state.'

title: Iran protests swell nationwide as crackdown intensifies and internet is cut
subhead: The country saw the largest demonstrations in nearly two weeks, with rights groups reporting dozens of protesters killed.

title: France enjoys another banner year for tourism, buoyed by campgrounds and international visitors
subhead: International tourism revenue rose by 9% in France in 2025, according to the United Nations World Tourism Organization.

title: 'Christopher Columbus embodying Trump and Meloni's supremacist fantasies is no coincidence'
subhead: 'Debated Figures' (1/5). Once praised by French traditionalist Catholics, the 'discoverer of America' is now celebrated by American and Italian leaders, writes historian Romain Bertrand.

'The raw and brutal display of American power in the Trump II era is finally opening the eyes of Washington's allies'
subhead: Europe finds itself in a perilous phase, having recognized its solitude but lacking the means for true autonomy, while the emotion created by the aggressiveness of empires calls for a response, writes Le Monde columnist Sylvie Kauffmann.

title: EU-Mercosur deal set to be signed, with or without France's support
subhead: The European Commission announced new concessions to the agricultural sector, lifting Italian objections and paving the way for the free trade agreement with South American countries to be signed on Monday.

title: Venezuela: How the US spent months preparing the military operation to capture Maduro
subhead: Images verified by Le Monde made it possible to reconstruct the US's vast military deployment at sea, on land and in the air in the months leading up to the abduction of the Venezuelan president.

title: Doctors' strike is a warning sign for French healthcare
